videoSnippet.title: Hans Unleashes a Devastating Attack
videoSnippet.description:
Photos by Lennart Ootes https://www.chessphotoshop.com/
Have a great day :)

Niemann, Hans Moke (2699) - Robson, Ray (2690) 
U.S. Championship (chess24.com) [6] 2022.10.11
E00 Queen's pawn game

1.d4 Nf6 2.c4 e6 3.Bf4 d5 4.cxd5 Nxd5 5.Bg3 c5 6.e4 Nf6 7.Nd2 Nc6 8.dxc5 Bxc5 9.e5 Nd5 10.Ngf3 O-O 11.a3 b6 12.Ne4 a5 13.Rc1 Nce7 14.Bd3 Ba6 15.Bxa6 Rxa6 16.O-O Qa8 17.Re1 Nf5 18.Nh4 Nxg3 19.hxg3 Be7 20.Qh5 b5 21.Nf3 Rc6 22.Rcd1 Rc2 23.b3 Ra2 24.Nd4 Rxa3 25.f4 Ra2 26.f5 Nc3 27.f6 Bxf6 28.Nxf6+ gxf6 29.Nf3 Nxd1 30.exf6 Kh8 31.Rxd1 Rg8 32.Kh2 Qe4 33.Rd7 Qe2 34.Qh3 Qxf3 35.Rxf7 Rxg2+

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:35 Game Starts!
01:45 Completely New Game!
07:15 Pause the Video!
10:45 It was in this position!
11:45 Contributions!

The 2022 U.S. Championship is a 14-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $262,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com
